name: Orion's Odyssey: A Pattern Blocks Adventure for Nintendo DS
blurb: A comedy-puzzle game following the adventures of Orion the robot and friends for the Nintendo DS handheld!

rewards.reward: All pledges will be given a special thanks on our website, as well as our eternal gratitude.\r\nMuch Love.
MUSIC LOVER REWARD: A digital version of the Orion's Odyssey soundtrack, featuring the music of Wayne Strange! You will also receive a set of digital wallpaper!
EARLY ADOPTER REWARD:  A physical copy of Orion's Odyssey for Nintendo DS. Ships anywhere in the US for free. You will also receive the game one month in advance.
GREEN TRIANGLE REWARD: A physical copy of Orion's Odyssey as well as a digital copy of the soundtrack. Ships anywhere in the US for free.
BLUE RHOMBUS REWARD: A physical copy of Orion's Odyssey, plus a physical version of the game's soundtrack! US Shipping included.

RED TRAPEZOID REWARD: A physical copy of the LIMITED EDITION version of Orion's Odyssey! Includes a physical copy of the game, a physical copy of the soundtrack, a Kickstarter exclusive cover sleeve and limited art prints from the game! Limited to only 250 backers!

YELLOW HEXAGON REWARD: A physical copy of the LIMITED EDITION of Orion's Odyssey, plus bonus digital tracks from our previous title, Hands On! Tangrams, also composed by Wayne Strange. You will also receive an art print signed by members of the dev team! Limited to only 100 backers!

ORANGE SQUARE REWARD. A physical copy of both the regular and limited editions of Orion's Odyssey! Plus, an additional physical copy of the soundtrack, and an art print signed by members of the development team! Limited to only 50 backers!

BEIGE RHOMBUS REWARD: Two physical copies of the complete limited edition of Orion's Odyssey! You will also receive TWO signed art prints from members of the development team!. Limited to only 25 backers!

ORION'S SWORD REWARD: In addition to receiving in game credit you will receive TWO sealed physical copies of the complete LIMITED EDITION VERSION Nintendo DS game which includes a physical copy of the game, a physical copy of the soundtrack, a specially designed KS exclusive cover sleeve and limited art prints from the game in a DELUXE COLLECTOR\u2019s CASE we are designing and having made in a very limited number. There will also be a limited edition Orion Statue we made from a 3D printer. Shipping anywhere included. This reward is limited to only 10 backers.

ORION'S CROWN REWARD: You will receive in game special credit and a PERSONALIZED Drawing of YOU with ORION by our concept artist Matt McKenna to accompany the LIMITED EDITION VERSION of the game inside of a Deluxe Collector\u2019s case including the physical soundtrack and limited art prints. In addition you will receive a case(6) of the regular version of the game with limited art prints and a two sets of signed art prints plus the digital bonus tracks. There will also be a limited edition Orion Statue we made from a 3D printer. This is limited to only 5 backers and shipping is FREE.

ORION'S SHIELD REWARD:  You will receive special in game credit that includes a caricature of your face by one of our amazing artists and Lunch or Dinner with the IO crew in our hometown of Woodbury, NJ (Travel not included). You will also receive Orion's Crown Reward (LE, Dlx case, 6 copies of the regular game, art prints, 2 sets of signed art prints and digital bonus tracks) PLUS WE WILL ALSO BE INCLUDING A LIMITED EDITION IO BRANDED FLASH DRIVE WITH A COLLECTION OF DIGITAL ASSETS FOR THE GAME INCLUDING THE SOUNDTRACK. There will also be a limited edition Orion Statue we made from a 3D printer. This is limited to only 4 backers.

BFF's REWARD: You will receive in game and manual credit as an Executive Producer on the game and you will be our guest to an exclusive industry only event in LA in June of 2014 and on top of that you will be the guest of honor at our annual \u201cFeats & Fun\u201d night after the show. This reward is limited to only 2 backers and covers airfare from anywhere in the continental US to LAX and back, hotel stay for FOUR nights in LA and transportation to all events scheduled. In addition you will receive the ORION\u2019S CROWN reward to boot (Ltd Edition, Dlx case, 6 copies of the regular game, art prints, 2 sets of signed art prints and digital bonus tracks). There will also be a limited edition Orion Statue we made from a 3D printer. Limited to only TWO BACKERS. Shipping is free anywhere.
